label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_005
content:
## 2026-01-07 Daily Operations Summary

### Infrastructure

- Memory Percentage: 61
- Disk Used Percentage: 72

- Net Out (Mbps): 100

- NTP Offset (ms): 2

#### bind-slave-02
- CPU Percentage: 25

- Disk Used Percentage: 55
- Net In (Mbps): 65
- Net Out (Mbps): 80

#### cloud-dns-sync-01
- CPU Percentage: 48
- Memory Percentage: 66
- Disk Used Percentage: 47
- Net In (Mbps): 92
- Net Out (Mbps): 126
- Queue Depth: 3
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

#### signer-01
- CPU Percentage: 34
- Memory Percentage: 70
- Disk Used Percentage: 59
- Net In (Mbps): 15
- Net Out (Mbps): 19
- HSM Slot Utilization Percentage: 54
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

### Events
- Added 16 more zones to cloud-managed DNS; completed NS delegation tests from 10 external resolvers with consistent answers.
- Rolled TTL standardization (most A/AAAA set to 3600) for 8 zones; one rollback for a CDN alias due to partner requirement of 300.
- Enabled prefetch for additional resolver POPs; cache hit rate improved and propagation averages remained stable.
- Closed out old on-prem monitoring checks for decommissioned slave; updated runbook to reflect cloud sync controller ownership.

### On Call
- Shift: J. Silva
- Pages: 1
- Tickets: 4
- Status: Stable; migration progressing on schedule with minor TTL exception.
